goal.ch: 課程目標是了解固態化學的基本概念與原理，研究各種不同的無機結晶性固體材料的合成、結構、化學鍵結、物理性質與應用，企圖了解這些材料的結構與性質的關聯。
goal.en: To understand the basic concepts and principles of solid-state chemistry by exploring synthesis, structure, chemical bonding, physical properties and applications of various inorganic crystalline solid materials, and to achieve an understanding of the structure-property correlation in these materials.

outline.ch:
An introduction to simple crystal structures
Preparative methods
Some factors that influence crystal structures
Defects and non-stoichiometry
Interpretation of phase diagrams
Bonding in solid and electronic properties
Optical properties of solids
Magnetism and magnetic materials

(1) A. R. West, State Chemistry and Its Applications, John Wiley ＆ Sons, 2014. 
(2) Lesley Smart and Elaine Moore, Solid State Chemistry, CRC Press, 4th Ed. 2012.

flexDiscription.ch: 學生可根據教材課程大綱與講義自主學習
flexDiscription.en: Students can study independently according to the textbook outline and handouts.

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
